techmeme.title: Sources: Musk has tapped Steve Davis, who oversaw Twitter's cost-cutting, ex-US CTO Michael Kratsios, and others to interview potential candidates for DOGE (Bloomberg)
The European Commission has pressed Apple to rework iOS so that it's more compatible with smartwatches, earbuds, headsets, and other devices from competitors (Bloomberg)
Apple says Meta has made 15 interoperability requests under the EU's DMA, more than any other company, and that these could affect users' privacy and security (Foo Yun Chee/Reuters)
Sony details the PS5 Pro's specs, including an AMD RDNA 2-based GPU with 16.7TF of performance and ray tracing improvements, and announces an AMD partnership (Will Judd/Eurogamer.net)
Micron reports Q1 revenue up 84% YoY to $8.71B, in line with est., Q2 revenue forecast below est. due to sluggish phone and PC demand; MU drops 15%+ after hours (Ian King/Bloomberg)
